sections.TOP:
Titan's Daughter026479glaadbu8ysv7ycmea1wy038kzfcya9d1761002015-03-10T03:43:13ZSharp Blades26158496[[File:TitansDaughter.png|thumb|250px|The ''Titan's Daughter'' leaving Saltpans.]]
The '''''Titan's Daughter''''' is a trading [[Ships|galleon]] from [[Braavos]], captained by [[Ternesio Terys]]. The ship is named after the [[Titan of Braavos]] and its prow is shaped like a woman.
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the ''Titan's Daughter'' is painted purple. She is a galleas, a hybrid between a galleon and a galley, with a gilded prow and three masts with purple sails, as well as a double bank of oars.
sections.History:
===[[Season 4]]===
While the ''Titan's Daughter'' is anchored at [[Saltpans]], [[Arya Stark]] secures passage to Braavos aboard the ship by showing the iron coin [[Jaqen H'ghar]] had given her and whispering the words "Valar Morghulis" to Ternesio Terys, the captain.<ref>"[[The Children]]"</ref>
